title: Effective Compliance Programs
description: Once you have an understanding of what compliance is, and why it may be important, it is natural to wonder next, “What should I do about it?”  In this course, we’ll explore one of the key factors for creating a positive culture of compliance: human psychology. We’ll think about what drives us, what makes us pay attention, what distracts, and how all of these pieces help build a strong belief in an organizational culture of compliance.
prerequisites: Basic understanding of business principles and an interest in organizational behavior.
learning_outcomes: Understand the role of human psychology in compliance, identify factors that drive and distract individuals, and develop strategies to build a strong culture of compliance within an organization.
price: Coursera offers courses through subscriptions and individual purchases. Check Coursera for current pricing.
